meanings.definition: Used to express feeling cold or shivering.
meanings.sent2: I said 'brr' when the cold wind hit me.
meanings.sent3: Bundled up in a warm coat, I still can't help but say 'brr' when I step outside.
meanings.sent4: The icy water made me shiver and say 'brr' involuntarily.
meanings.sent5: The freezing temperature made me go 'brr' as I wrapped myself in a blanket.

meanings.definition: A sound made when someone is cold or shivering.
meanings.sent1: I heard a loud 'brr' from the person standing in the snow.
meanings.sent2: The 'brr' of the shivering child echoed in the room.
meanings.sent3: The sudden 'brr' from the cold person startled the others.
meanings.sent4: The constant 'brr' of the freezing man filled the silent night.
meanings.sent5: The distinct 'brr' of coldness made everyone rush to get warm.
